QuestData.Title: Search Stillpine Hold
QuestData.Description: As High Chief, my immediate concern is the root of the corruption in Stillpine Hold.$B$BWhy did the wildkin - once our allies - attack us? Why have they taken residence in Stillpine Hold?$B$BPerhaps something inside will hold the answer. Search Stillpine Hold for clues as to the source of corruption.
QuestData.RewardText: The blood crystal radiates a sickly aura that seeps into the water of the cave.
